entry.title: Installing R on MacOSX Yosemite
entry.content:
Here is how you can install Programming Language R on MacOSX Yosemite

Step 1: You need HomeBrew, its pretty easy, please visit http://brew.sh/ for instruction to install HomeBrew.

Step 2: Open Terminal, execute the following,

      brew tap homebrew/science
      brew install gcc
      brew install r

The gcc package is the homebrew/science tap already contains the latest fortran compiler(gfortran), and most of all: the whole package is precompiled so it saves you a lot of compilation time.

Mohit
